8.	 the plane p1 has equation
x – 5y + 3z = 11
	
the plane p2 has equation 
3x – 2y + 2z = 7
	
the planes p1 and p2 intersect in the line l.
	
(a)	 find a vector equation for l, giving your answer in the form r = a + λb where 
a and b are constant vectors and λ is a scalar parameter.
(5)
	
the point p(2, 0, 3) lies on p1
	
the line m, which passes through p, is parallel to l.
	
the point q (3, 2, 1) lies on p2
	
the line n, which passes through q, is also parallel to l.
	
(b)	 find, in exact simplified form, the shortest distance between m and n.
(5)
